p: HEV IgG and IgM were measured in total in 1154 and 1165 patients, respectively, as matter of clinical routine. HEV RNA levels were measured by extracting RNA using the MagNa Pure 96 Instrument (Roche, Penzberg, Germany) followed by amplification and detection with the RealStar HEV RT-PCR Kit (Altona Diagnostics, Hamburg, Germany) on the RotorGene Q (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany) according to the manufacturersâ€™ instructions.
